start.__text: generate images for MEME smart contract

branches.title: MEME
branches.instruction: When the user wants to generate images for MEME smart contract, select branch 'MEME'.

branches.title: web_reader
branches.instruction: When the user give a website URL and wants to summarize the article, select branch 'web_reader'.

branches.title: google
branches.instruction: When the user wants to query some realtime information, select branch 'google'.
